alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 7:02PM CDT until May 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morton County in southwestern Kansas... Western Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Feterita, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Feterita around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hugoton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
